parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Like-minded, of the same mind or spirit. From isos and psuche; of similar spirit.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: Truly, genuinely, honorably, sincerely. Adverb from gnesios; genuinely, i.e. Really.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be over-anxious; with acc: To be anxious about, distracted; I care for. From merimna; to be anxious about.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
